summary: Implements the encoder component of a layout-aware transformer model, generating combined token and spatial embeddings (1‑D and 2‑D) and applying relative position bucketing before feeding the representations through transformer layers to obtain contextualized document features.
business_intent: Enables downstream document AI applications such as form parsing, receipt analysis, and information extraction by providing rich, layout‑sensitive embeddings for text extracted from scanned or photographed documents.
